text: -Yeah, yeah.

Woah.
Don't worry so much about it.
Mom, remember him from before?

Here,
because we have a reliable producer to rely on!

Hana,
I got the key to the dorm room—

-Ah, sorry,
You were on the phone...
No worries, I just finished the call.

It was from Mom,
she's really worried...
I see.

Haha, you just finished the call and
you're already at the chain.
Haha...

Daughter leaving home alone, becoming an idol...
It's understandable to worry.

That's why I have to do my best
to alleviate Mom's worries.

Huh?
...Specifically? How will you do your best?

...That's...
To make sure Hana doesn't feel anxious or lonely.

So,
if i feel lonely in the middle of the night—

Maybe I could just ask
producer to come meet me?
R-right.

In that case,
I'll try to make sure I can come...
Haha, yeah right.

Producer seems busy,
so I don't think you should do that.
R-Right...

.......
...But I think—

If you ever need anything, if it's too hard to
handle alone, I want you to rely on me.

Okay...
Thank you.

And, in the dorm,
there are plenty of other idols too.

You might,
not feel lonely after all.
Hehe, that's true.
I hope I can get along well with the seniors.

Yeah, I, too, am looking forward to the interaction
between Hana and everyone else in the office.

Alright, before that, Hana,
let me show you around the dorm.
Okay!

...But before that...
...Once again...

...Hana,
welcome to 283 Production.

...!
Yeah.
I'm just a novice, but please take care of me.
...Hehe.
